app_descript:
App Name: Kanvas Lab Package Name: kanvas-lab

Brief: Kanvas Lab is an innovative and versatile application designed for the creatively inclined. Whether you're looking to stream live videos, indulge in visual messaging, or create captivating drawings, this app has got you covered. It is a one-stop creative platform that allows you to produce and share your own photos, GIFs, and videos, fueling your imagination to new heights. It's a space where your creativity is free to reign, and sharing your artistry with friends via social platforms is just a click away.
